maxCapacity.description: The maximum Neptune Capacity Units (NCUs) for this cluster. Must be lower or equal than **128**. See [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/neptune/latest/userguide/neptune-serverless-capacity-scaling.html) for more details.

minCapacity.description: The minimum Neptune Capacity Units (NCUs) for this cluster. Must be greater or equal than **1**. See [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/neptune/latest/userguide/neptune-serverless-capacity-scaling.html) for more details.
